featureSplit.utils

Class FeatureGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • featureSplit.utils.FeatureGraph

  • public class FeatureGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    Graph representing the measures between the features in the dataset. A full attribute set can be represented as the feature graph where the nodes of the graph are the features. The relationship between the feature pair can be calculated by a given measure (e.g. mutual information) and coded as the edge between the two features where the weight of the edge corresponds to the measure value

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> graph
      feature graph is represented as the map - key: featureName1_featureName2 (it is assumed that the feature names are unique), value: weight of the edge between the two features
